meanings.sent1: She regularized her study routine by setting a fixed schedule for each subject.
meanings.sent2: The company regularized its quality control process to ensure uniformity in product standards.
meanings.sent3: The chef regularized the ingredients in the recipe, making sure each dish tasted the same every time.
meanings.sent4: His daily exercise routine regularized his energy levels, keeping him active throughout the day.
meanings.sent5: Regularized watering of the plants helped them thrive and bloom beautifully.

meanings.definition: To bring into conformity with a standard or rule
meanings.sent1: The school regularized the dress code to align with the new policy.
meanings.sent2: The committee regularized the voting procedures to ensure fairness in the election.
meanings.sent3: The magician regularized his tricks, making sure each illusion followed the same pattern.
meanings.sent4: The coach regularized the team's training regimen, aiming for consistent performance on the field.
meanings.sent5: Regularized traffic rules helped reduce accidents and improve road safety.
